text: Yeh hai aur jo koi Allah ki hurmaton ki tazeem keray uss kay apnay liye uss kay rab kay pass behtari hai. Aur tumharay liye chopaye janwar halal ker diya gaye ba-juz unn kay jo tumharay samney biyan kiye gaye hain pus tumhen buton ki gandagi say bachtay rehna chahiye aur jhooti baat say bhi perhez kerna chahiye
